summary:
Highly skilled and experienced Full Stack Web Developer with years of hands-on experience designing, developing, and implementing applications and solutions using various technologies and programming languages. Demonstrated success in delivering top-quality software products throughout the entire software development life cycle, from gathering requirements to production release. Possesses comprehensive knowledge of Algorithms, Principles and Design Patterns, Web Service architectures, Microservice architecture, Clean Architecture, Domain Driven Design (DDD), Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts, Continuous Integration and delivery (CI/CD), and all SDLC phases. 

Specialties,
• RESTful Web Service
• Microservices
• Dockerized Applications
• Single Page Applications (SPA)
• Relational databases

A quick learner who can absorb new ideas and can work independently. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify complex technical issues and develop effective solutions. A collaborative friendly person and team player with good verbal and written communication skills.

certifications.name: Microservices and Azure Service Fabric Basics for Developers
Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist: .NET Framework 4, Web Applications

profile_positions.description:
The Government Technology Agency (GovTech) is a Singaporean statutory board. Its expert team uses Agile, user experience design, quality engineering, DevOps, and platform as a service to create scalable, resilient, and reusable digital services.

▣ CROWDTASK (CTSG)
A crowdsourcing platform enables government agencies to create surveys and tasks for the public, rewarding their opinions. It includes separate portals for the public and the agencies.

•	Refactored the backend, enabling seamless extension and integration of new survey types, while minimizing extensive modifications.
•	Worked closely with DevOps teams to deploy applications in cloud-based environment.
•	Implemented caching mechanisms to reduce database load and enhance overall performance.
•	Successfully integrate third-party services into the application, enhancing its functionality and user experience.
•	Implemented automated tests for the frontend, ensuring robustness and reliability.
•	Successfully integrated Redux in a frontend ReactJS application to efficiently manage state and enhance overall performance.
•	Mentored and guided junior developers conducted code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to coding standards.
profile_positions.title: Senior Application Developer

profile_positions.description:
IHiS is the leading technology agency for Singapore's public healthcare sector. It digitizes, connects, and analyzes the health ecosystem, supporting over 50,000 healthcare users through clinical informatics, computer science, data science, mechatronics, and standards-based IT.
 
▣ SMART HEALTH VITAL SIGNS MONITORING (VSM) AND HEALTH DISCOVERY
Remotely monitors vital signs of patients with conditions like hypertension, diabetes, and heart or pulmonary diseases. It includes components such as remote monitoring devices, SMS and mobile chatbots for patient advice, a backend for real-time processing and alerts, and a web-based dashboard for care teams to monitor and support patients.

•	Played a key role in architectural decisions, ensuring the backend infrastructure was flexible, scalable, and maintainable.
•	Engaged directly with stakeholders, ensuring effective communication and collaboration throughout project lifecycles.
•	Spearheaded the development of the Care team dashboard and its associated API.
•	Designed and implemented an innovative Anonymization module, employing encryption techniques to safeguard sensitive patient information.
•	Configuration and management of CI/CD pipelines and system infrastructure, ensuring streamlined deployment and operation.
•	Conducted code review and provided feedback to the team members.
•	Developed a Reporting engine to generate comprehensive statistical reports.
•	Successfully migrated the databases from the legacy system preserving data integrity.
profile_positions.title: Asistant Lead Engineer

profile_positions.description:
IronOne Technologies is a multinational IT company with a strong presence in the USA, Malaysia, South Africa, India, and Sri Lanka. It specializes in enterprise solutions, web and mobile app development, and cloud computing. IronOne collaborates with renowned US vendors like Victorias Secret, Macy's, and Ralph Lauren.

▣ PLUCKERS CATERING WEBSITE 
This online catering platform for Pluckers, a US restaurant chain, includes two Admin CMSs, a RESTful WebAPI, an OAuth Authentication Service, a Catering Website, and iOS and Android mobile apps. The system enables store management, messaging, push notifications, catering order management, report exports, and seamless user authentication with Single Sign-On (SSO).

•	Utilized modern approaches such as Clean Architecture, Microservice Architecture, and Domain-Driven Design to develop robust and scalable solutions.
•	Led a team of 4 backend developers and effectively coordinated with other teams to ensure timely and high-quality product delivery.
•	Conducted requirement analysis, effort estimation, planning, and implementing plans.
•	Responsible for technical design documentation.
•	Took charge of designing Architecture, RESTful APIs and databases.
•	Mentored and coached junior developers, guiding them.
•	Performed regular code reviews, offering constructive feedback.
•	Managed deployments, maintenance, and infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
▣ PINK CAMPUS REP 
A surveying application with iOS and Android apps, an Admin CMS, and a RESTful web API. It collects user feedback from Campus representatives and supports various question types, including Free Text, Checkbox, Radio button, Photo, Video, and ranking questions.

•	Played a key role in conducting requirement analysis, effort estimation, planning, and implementing plans.
•	Contributed to the design of Architecture, RESTful APIs and databases.
•	Implemented more efficient CI/CD processes and automated testing, significantly reducing the time required for unit and regression testing.
•	Carried out performance tuning, Code optimization, and Resource optimization.
•	Conducted regular code reviews and provided constructive feedback. 
•	Successfully managed deployments, maintenance, and infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
▣ TRACKIEX
TrackieX is a GPS tracker device and mobile app for child monitoring. It includes iOS and Android apps, a web application, and provides additional security features like Geo fences, Speed alerts, and SOS alerts.

•	Contributed to Requirement Analysis and the preparation of Software Requirement Specification and Design Document Specification. 
•	Acted as one of the primary developers responsible for implementing RESTful APIs.
•	Carried out performance tuning, Code optimization, Resource optimization.
•	Infrastructure Management.
•	Testing, debugging, analyzing issues, and fixing.

▣ OVER THE SHOULDER 
The platform offers qualitative researchers and insight-seekers an opportunity to carry out smartphone-based qualitative studies on their target consumers to generate stronger consumer insights. The project includes iOS and Android native mobile applications, a Web API, and an Admin CMS. Through the application, users can create and schedule surveys that include multiple question types.

•	Conducted user requirements analysis, researching and evaluating tools and technologies for optimal implementation.
•	Played a key role as one of the primary developers responsible for implementing RESTful APIs.
•	Conducted performance tuning, code optimization, and resource optimization to improve overall system efficiency.
•	Deployments and maintenance.
•	Testing, debugging, analyzing issues, and fixing.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
